action_list.description: System action for installing an application
action_list.name: action_install

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

sudo cp /opt/neo/files/controller/conf/nutanix-neo-plugin.cfg /opt/nutanix-neo/config/nutanix-neo-plugin.cfg

sudo sed -i '/\[NEO\]/,+1 s/ip.*/ip=127.0.0.1/' /opt/nutanix-neo/config/nutanix-neo-plugin.cfg
sudo sed -i '/\[PRISM\]/,+2 s/ip.*/ip=@@{PC_IP}@@/' /opt/nutanix-neo/config/nutanix-neo-plugin.cfg
sudo sed -i '/\[PRISM\]/,+1 s/username.*/username=@@{PC_USERNAME}@@/' /opt/nutanix-neo/config/nutanix-neo-plugin.cfg
sudo sed -i '/\[PRISM\]/,+6 s/cluster_default_username.*/cluster_default_username=@@{PE_USERNAME}@@/' /opt/nutanix-neo/config/nutanix-neo-plugin.cfg

source /opt/nutanix-neo/venv/bin/activate && python /opt/nutanix-neo/utils/encrypt_config.py --section PRISM --option password --value @@{PC_PASSWORD}@@
source /opt/nutanix-neo/venv/bin/activate && python /opt/nutanix-neo/utils/encrypt_config.py --section PRISM --option cluster_default_password --value @@{PE_PASSWORD}@@

sudo cp /opt/nutanix-neo/config/nutanix-neo-plugin.cfg /opt/neo/files/controller/conf/nutanix-neo-plugin.cfg

sudo service nutanix-neo restart
sleep 2
sudo service nutanix-neo status

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall
